mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notification(bno, rno, username, type) values(#{bno}, #{rno}, #{username}, #{type})
mapper.select: select nno, tbl_notification.regdate, read_flag, delete_flag, tbl_board.bno, tbl_reply.rno, username, tbl_notification.type, title, reply from tbl_notification, tbl_reply, tbl_board where tbl_notification.username=#{username} and tbl_notification.delete_flag='0' and tbl_notification.rno=tbl_reply.rno and tbl_notification.bno=tbl_board.bno limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select count(nno) from tbl_notification where username=#{username}
mapper.update: update table tbl_notification set read_flag='1' where nno=#{nno}
update table tbl_notification set delete_flag='1' where nno=#{nno}
